type.title: Short title.
type.context: PUBLIC GENERAL LOAN (SUPPLEMENTARY) ACT under Short title. 1. This Act may be cited as the Public General Loan  (Supplementary) Act.
type.description: This Act may be cited as the Public General Loan  (Supplementary) Act.

type.name: section
type.title: Method of raising loan.
type.context: PUBLIC GENERAL LOAN (SUPPLEMENTARY) ACT under Method of raising loan. 2.  Anything to the contrary contained in the General Loan and Stock Act notwithstanding, whenever authority shall have been given to the Minister by Act to raise by loan in London any sum of money for public purposes such loan, or any part thereof, may be raised independently of that Act and under this Act if the Minister, or the Crown Agents in the United Kingdom for Overseas Governments  and Administrations (hereinafter referred to as the Crown Agents) acting on the Ministers behalf, so decide. type.name: section
type.title: Loan and interest charged to be part of public debt.
type.context: PUBLIC GENERAL LOAN (SUPPLEMENTARY) ACT under Loan and interest charged to be part of public debt. 3. The principal  moneys  and interest  represented by  any loan raised under this Act shall be part of the public debt of Guyana within the meaning of Article 221 of the Constitution.
